name: Disaster Tour
description:
An interstellar rock-band's tour ship is caught in Jupiter's gravitational pull! Complete all tasks before the time runs out to save the band!

Known Issue: The tablet on the top right of the screen does not function properly in the WebGL version of the game (the version here on itch), but does not hinder gameplay.

Art by Richard Fleming

Game Design by Annie Krueger

Programming and Level Design by Marshall Krueger
